words.source: H1961 hayah, Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'And it came to pass', ESV 'At', NASB 'Now it came about'
H1870 derek, noun ms + preposition be + article; KJV 'by the way', ESV 'on the way', NASB 'on the way'
H4411 malon, noun ms + preposition be + article; KJV 'in the inn', ESV 'at the lodging place', NASB 'at the lodging place'
H6298 pagash, Qal wayyiqtol 3ms + 3ms suffix; KJV 'met him', ESV 'met him', NASB 'met him' — THEOLOGICALLY DEBATED: the subject is YHWH; 'him' likely refers to Moses
H3068 YHWH, proper noun divine; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the LORD'
H1245 baqash, Piel wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'and sought', ESV 'and sought', NASB 'and sought'

H4191 muth, Hiphil infinitive construct + 3ms suffix; KJV 'to kill him', ESV 'to put him to death', NASB 'to put him to death' — THEOLOGICALLY DEBATED: enigmatic passage; why YHWH sought to kill Moses is heavily debated; likely connected to uncircumcised son
